definition: Fangshan district of Beijing, formerly Fangshan county
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Therefore, Sinolgis has currently established a green motorcade in Fangshan District in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 因此，華儲現已在北京市房山區建立綠色車隊。

sentences.english: The southwestern district of Fangshan was the hardest hit.
sentences.chinese: 北京市西南部的房山區受災最重。
